title: Teen Shoots Accidentally Shoots Himself in White Co.
content:
WHITE COUNTY, AR - Deputies in White County are investigating an accidental shooting involving a teen.
At 11:25 Thursday (July 30) morning, deputies were sent to N. Vinity Road where a 14-year-old boy suffered from a self-inflicted gunshot wound to the face.
Th boy was transported to the Unity Health Medical Center in Searcy for treatment and stabilization.
Deputies say this incident is an ongoing investigation at this time.
